law.catch_line: Any person that transacts business in the name or for the account of a limited liability partnership...

text.section: Any person that transacts business in the name or for the account of a limited liability partnership knowing that its right to do business in Maryland has been forfeited and has not been reinstated is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine of not more than $500.
A prosecution for violation of the provisions of this section may not be instituted after the date the certificate of reinstatement of the limited liability partnership is filed.
